step_data.thought: I've clicked on the 'REPORTS' menu which has opened the Reports submenu. Now I need to find the Product Reviews report. Looking at the menu structure, I can see there's a 'Reviews' section at bid [379] with two options under it: 'By Customers' and 'By Products'. The 'By Products' option at bid [387] is what I need since it will show product reviews. This will allow me to view the Product Reviews report as requested.
